attributes.additional_details:
According to research by the University of Scotland and Sodastream, 88% of people would visit a pub again if it carried Sky Sports compared to a miserable 7% for those that don't carry the channels.

I think the numbers speak for themselves.
attributes.background: Sky Sports should be made free to air on terrestrial television, BSkyB will still be fine financially without the cost of the premium subscription fee, they know this but they only care about money.

rejection.details: This would be a commercial decision for Sky and DTV Services Ltd., who operate Freeview.
